name: Block Heist
description:
In Block Heist, things are a little different than in the normal world. Most people would hide in boxes to be sneaky, but in this world you and the guards are boxes and you must put on a human costume to hide from the cops. Why do you want to hide?

Because the guards are holding the most valuable thing in block world. A penny.

Collect the keys to unlock the door to the penny, then go and find the exit. 

Don't let the guards flashlights touch you!!
